data.name: Zaccaria Pinball - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes all soundtracks of Remake tables in OGG format.

The DLC will be updated with new tracks every time a new remake table releases.

Streamers can use these tracks in their live feeds.

Track Format: OGG, Stereo, 48khz.

Track Files Location:
\\Steam\steamapps\common\Zaccaria Pinball\OST

Track List:
01. Zaccaria Pinball - Main Menu Theme.ogg
02. Zaccaria Pinball - Shooting The Rapids 2016 - Main Theme.ogg
